arts.ttl: Rangers fightback falls short against Sturm Graz to keep heat on Russell Martin
arts.sum: Rangers showed fighting spirit against Sturm Graz, but first-half defensive lapses resulted in a second Europa League defeat in eight days to keep under-fire boss Russell Martin on the back foot.

arts.ttl: Why Russell Martin made two subs at halftime in Rangers' loss to Sturm Graz
arts.sum: Russell Martin has explained his decision to make a double substitution at half-time in Rangers' 2-1 defeat to Sturm Graz.

arts.ttl: Sturm Graz 2-1 Rangers: Pressure Mounts on Russell Martin as Gers lose in Austria
arts.sum: Graz took the lead early on as Tomi Horvat’s effort squirmed past Jack Butland and into the Rangers' net. The pressure mounted on Russell Martin and Rangers as they were condemned to a 2-1 defeat by Sturm Graz in the UEFA Europa League .

arts.ttl: Rangers defensive horror show costs them at Sturm Graz
arts.sum: A first-half defensive horror show cost Rangers a 2-1 defeat at Sturm Graz to remain without a point in the Europa League, which keeps the pressure on Gers boss Russell Martin.
